reviewText: What a fun way to entertain my kids.  We love music and we LOVE books.  The combination.. priceless!  We have watched this over and over again. And read the book as well!
What a fun book about a very big family gathering.  We definitely have plenty of those to compare it to.  Great book for comparing!  And just a fun book to read with the family.

My students thoroughly enjoyed this book!  They asked for it to be read and reread over and over again!  I suggest getting it as a gift for any children that you know!  Great holiday gift and birthday gift!
